projects.name: GESFARMAX
projects.desc: GesFarmaX is an application which helps pharmacies keep track of information, to help them sell things such as medicines, syringes, and wheelchairs.

projects.name: GESAP
projects.desc: GESAP is an application for managing agricultural and productive information of a company in the agricultural sector.

projects.name: PLUVIOPIVOT
projects.desc: Pluviopivot is an application that allows to evaluate the irrigation machines of central pivot in accordance with the computation of necessary parameters. The application is composed of the following parts: Pluviopivot WEB, Pluviopivot APK and API REST.

projects.name: GESDAM
projects.desc: GESDAMN is a desktop application developed in order to manage the construction materials that the government gives to people affected by natural disasters. In this application we used different Design Patterns like MVC, Singleton and Mediator.

projects.name: BIMAS
projects.desc: BIMAS means Business Intelligence and more, like its name suggests it allows decision-making in a company through the use of data. It uses information systems, for example, Excel documents or databases with information about the company, such as production, economy, etc. Through ETL tools and techniques the data are extracted, purified and prepared from the different sources. One the data are homogenized then they upload to a data warehouse. After that, it allows representation based on queries to create a control panel for the inform presentation. The application was developed  and maintained for the Villa Clara DESOFT team. It is composed of the following parts: BIMAS Server, BIMAS Smifor and BIMAS APK.

projects.name: AGESP
projects.desc: AGESP is an application developed for a security and protection company. It is oriented to manage the incidences in ports and railways located in Cuba’s central provinces. Also, it allows users to export and to import reports about the incidences by sending them by email. Furthermore, it includes a Intranet with company’s information such as its history, workers, important dates, news, etc.

about.about-intro: My name is Yunet Luis Ruíz, I am a Bachelor in Computer Science, with 3 years of experience as Software Developer. I love to learn new technologies and to improve my knowlegde every day. If you need more information then you can see and download my CV

facts-desc.1: My goal is to become in a successful professional.
facts-desc.2: I always focus on my work, and I'm the biggest critic of it.
facts-desc.3: I enjoy take new and exciting challenges every day.
facts-desc.4: I love to study interesting topics about computer science and share experiences with other developers.
facts-desc.5: I like to dance, to listen to music, and to walk around the city.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Do you need more information? Please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions, comments or messages.
contact.name: Your name
contact.subject: Subject

footer.info: I'm a software developer living in Vienna, Austria. I have a great passion for my work and the new technologies in general.
footer.more-desc: I like to make cool and creative designs, regardless of what medium I'm working in.

November 01, 2020.title: Do you want your own website?
November 01, 2020.desc: In this article, you can read about what a website is as well as its importance nowadays, the different type of websites, and how you can create one.
November 01, 2020.phrase: I figured I should have a website, because that's what everybody was doing.

December 01, 2020.title: Website creation roles
December 01, 2020.desc: In this article, you can read about the main roles that contribute in the website's creation, their responsibilities, their respective average salaries, and the typical tools of the trade. In addition, you will take a look about some non-technical but crucial skills that every web designer or developer should have.
December 01, 2020.phrase: Website without visitors is like a ship lost in the horizon.
